TopicTitle: How does one edit an atmosphere?

Articles.Content:
So, I want to edit an atmosphere for a planet because I plan to create a new planet orbiting close to the sun. 

How does one add or edit the atmosphere on a planet?

You'll have to use a mod like [Kopernicus](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114649-0-90-Kopernicus-Pre-Alpha-%280-0-6%29) to do so. There's no way to do so directly through the channels that Squad provides.
